title: glamour font
content:
Hi,  
I fell in love about this font...Anyone know her name ?  
thx in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GlamStyle.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820072114/http:/typophile.com/files/GlamStyle.png) | 739.71 KB |
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content: While remarkably close, the two lowercase l's are not identical. That, coupled with the unique "Gl" and "St" joins, makes me pretty sure this was done by hand.
@PublishingMojo Yea you could be right. I wonder if there are any scripts that have the same look and feel...
